sub_title: Freelance Web Architect and Development Lead
summary:
Check my new website with full resume in multiple languages at: markwouters.com

Freelance front- and backend architect and development lead, that creates distributed always-on systems. Experienced in Angular, React, NextJS, NodeJS, GraphQL. Web technology and user experience is all I breathe.

View and download my resume on: markwouters.com (or click the Personal Website link above)

Currently working on Veeds, a web scale content aggregator that shows trending content.
